segments.text: Observing this, the kitchen seems bright from the window light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is engrossed in polishing that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unseen by her, the sink overflows dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms at her feet, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids plot their cookie heist quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool reaches high into the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It wobbles, threatening to topple him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl below pleads with open hand for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their excitement is palpable, even in drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the wet floor adds slipperiness to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets will be damaged from the constant water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks inviting and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for these little ones.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness could lead to a big accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
